description:
The Grafana dashboard for Network Observability add-on for AKS.

•	Get access to cluster level network metrics like packet drops, connections stats and more.  
•	(Coming soon) Access to pod-level metrics for tracking network errors

options.content:
# Network Observability Metrics 

Use this dashboard to visualise metrics from the Network Observability add-on for AKS. Dashboard displays metrics from Linux and Windows Clusters. To hide the irrelevant metrics, simply collapse the unwanted sections. Alternatively, you can edit the dashboard to delete unwanted panels. For any questions or issues, please see [our documentation](https://aka.ms/NetObsAddonDoc)

panels.title: TCP Active Connection count by Remote Addr

title: Kubernetes / Network Observability / Networking
